articles.title: Boston to host FIFA World Cup Fan Fest at City Hall Plaza
articles.description:
“There’s no greater sports town in all of America than Boston.”

The post Boston to host FIFA World Cup Fan Fest at City Hall Plaza appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Boston will host a FIFA World Cup Fan Fest at City Hall Plaza in 2026.
The event aims to engage local fans and celebrate soccer culture in the city.
Residents can expect increased tourism and community activities during the World Cup.

articles.title: Are MBTA commuters destined to suffer for the rest of the winter?
articles.description:
“I want riders to know that even in future storms, we will get better,” MBTA General Manager Phil Eng said recently.

The post Are MBTA commuters destined to suffer for the rest of the winter? appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: MBTA General Manager Phil Eng assures improvements for riders during future winter storms.
Commuters may face continued challenges as winter weather persists in Boston.
Local residents are urged to prepare for potential delays and disruptions in transit services.

articles.title: Wu says she would vote for statewide rent control through proposed ballot question
articles.description:
While Boston Mayor Michelle Wu would prefer a local option, she said she would not "let perfect be the enemy of the good" when discussing a blanket cap on rent hikes.

The post Wu says she would vote for statewide rent control through proposed ballot question appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Mayor Michelle Wu supports statewide rent control despite preferring local options.
Wu emphasizes not letting perfect solutions hinder progress on rent cap proposals.
Statewide rent control could significantly affect Boston's housing affordability for residents.

articles.title: Norwegian biathlon bronze medalist confesses to cheating on girlfriend in post-race interview
articles.description:
"I'm not quite sure what I’m trying to say by saying this now, but sport has taken a back seat in recent days."

The post Norwegian biathlon bronze medalist confesses to cheating on girlfriend in post-race interview appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Norwegian biathlon bronze medalist admits to infidelity during a post-race interview.
The confession raises questions about athlete conduct and personal accountability in sports.
Boston residents may discuss the implications of personal scandals on public figures.

articles.title: Christian Gonzalez on Patriots extension talks: ‘I don’t want to be anywhere else’
articles.description:
"He deserves his pay day for sure.”

The post Christian Gonzalez on Patriots extension talks: ‘I don’t want to be anywhere else’ appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Christian Gonzalez expresses desire to remain with the Patriots amid contract extension talks.
Gonzalez's performance has led to calls for a significant pay increase.
His potential extension could influence team dynamics and fan support in Boston.
